meeting_info.organization: City of Dallas Public Facility Corporation
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Auditorium L1FN and Videoconference, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, TX 75201

agenda_items.title: Recognition
agenda_items.description: Recognition of Raul Reyes, Dallas Public Facility Corporation Board Member

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the minutes of February 27, 2024 Board Meeting

agenda_items.title: Resolution for Santa Fe Trail at Haskell
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution approving the transaction for Santa Fe Trail at Haskell located at 4000 Ash Street, Dallas, TX; including the execution of all documentation necessary to carry out the transactions; authorizing the purchase of the land for the projects and authorizing the Dallas Public Facility Corporation to serve as the general contractor; and other matters in connection therewith
agenda_items.presenter: Albert Gonzalez, Jim Plummer, Tim Nelson

agenda_items.title: Resolution for Bloc House Santa Fe Trail
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution authorizing the negotiation and execution of a Term Sheet for Bloc House Santa Fe Trail in partnership with Bloc House to be located at 4533 Willow Street, Dallas, TX
agenda_items.presenter: Albert Gonzalez, Jim Plummer, Tim Nelson

agenda_items.title: Appointments
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution authorizing the appointments of Albert Gonzalez, Dallas PFC Administrator, as the Corporation’s General Manager and Sam McDaniel, Dallas PFC Project Manager, as the Corporation’s Assistant General Manager

agenda_items.title: Governance Committee Appointments
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution authorizing the appointment of One Dallas Public Facility Corporation Board member to the Dallas Public Facility Corporation Governance Committee and the appointment of Three Dallas Public Facility Corporation Board members to the Dallas Public Facility Corporation Community Outreach Committee

agenda_items.title: Website Design Services
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of Cimone Key Creative Studio, LLC for website design and maintenance services

agenda_items.title: 2023 Annual Report
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of 2023 Annual Report

agenda_items.title: Community Reinvestment Review
agenda_items.description: Discussion and review of Dallas Public Facility Corporation’s community reinvestment

agenda_items.title: Directors and Officers Insurance Review
agenda_items.description: Discussion and review of Directors and Officers Insurance coverage for the Dallas Public Facility Corporation’s Board of Directors and Officers

agenda_items.title: Treasurer’s Report Review
agenda_items.description: Discussion and review of Dallas PFC Treasurer’s Report

agenda_items.title: Pipeline Report Review
agenda_items.description: Discussion and review of Dallas PFC Pipeline Report
